analysis.key_quote: I am concerned that creating a rule to change federal workers to "at-will" will threaten the functioning of the government, set back government health, education and research efforts, and threatened access to crucial programs such as Social Security, Medicare and Medicaid.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the implications of changing federal workers to 'at-will' status, which threatens the integrity and functioning of government services. This aligns with themes of merit-based systems and due process protections.
